sections.heading: examination as condition of employment; exemptions from sections
sections.text: The provisions of sections 48-220 to 48-223 shall not apply to any employment relationship entered into by the state or any subdivision of the state when a physical examination is required by law as a condition of employment.SourceLaws

48-223.Medical examination as condition of employment; exemptions from sections.

The provisions of sections 48-220 to 48-223 shall not apply to any employment relationship entered into by the state or any subdivision of the state when a physical examination is required by law as a condition of employment.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 280, ยง 4, p. 838.
